wiki.summary: "Bubble Gum" is a song recorded by the South Korean girl group NewJeans. It was released on April 27, 2024, as a pre-release track from their single album "How Sweet," under ADOR. The song embodies themes of youthful exuberance and carefree love, using the metaphor of bubble gum to evoke feelings of sweetness and playfulness. The lyrics describe a relationship that is both lighthearted and enchanting, with imagery of flying high and enjoying the simple joys of life. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Bubble Gum" is a song recorded by the South Korean girl group NewJeans. It was released on April 27, 2024, as a pre-release track from their single album "How Sweet," under ADOR. The song embodies themes of youthful exuberance and carefree love, using the metaphor of bubble gum to evoke feelings of sweetness and playfulness. The lyrics describe a relationship that is both lighthearted and enchanting, with imagery of flying high and enjoying the simple joys of life. The track's upbeat melody and vibrant sound capture the essence of fun and freedom, further showcasing NewJeans' ability to blend catchy rhythms with heartfelt lyrics. "Bubble Gum" has been praised for its catchy chorus and refreshing vibe, solidifying NewJeans' position in the K-pop scene. Read more on Last.fm.
